Text: If you are still having trouble with that rotating mouse. Try that this link http://bayfiles.com/file/1h5D/KiVPnO/ss3.rar I hope i did it right. It is a key registry editor for Serious Sam 3. I had to make the folders though to make it work, but it worked like a champ. Steam\SteamApps\common\serios sam 3 folder. If you have those folders make sure to put it in the serious sam 3 folder and just run it from inside that folder. It worked for me.
